org.gsma.joyn.contacts

Class ContactsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gsma.joyn.JoynService
      • org.gsma.joyn.contacts.ContactsService

  • public class ContactsService
extends JoynService
    Contacts service offers additional methods to manage RCS info in the local address book. The parameter contact in the API supports the following formats: MSISDN in national or international format, SIP address, SIP-URI or Tel-URI.
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET

      • getJoynContactsSupporting

        public java.util.Set<JoynContact> getJoynContactsSupporting(java.lang.String tag)
                                                     throws JoynServiceException
        Returns the list of contacts supporting a given extension (i.e. feature tag)
        Parameters:
        tag - Supported extension tag. The format of the tag may be the complete IARI tag (i.e. +g.3gpp.iari-ref="xxxxxx") or just the right part of the tag without quotes (xxxxxx).
        Returns:
        List of contacts
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
